channel.title: Big Client Bug
channel.description:
so i was haveing trubble whith loading my client when i load it up i get this message
[code]java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at client.drawLogo(client.java:3951) at client.startUp(client.java:9140) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:38) at client.run(client.java:6078) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Starting up 20 [/code]
now i need to fix this below is all the code and if you want my client to try and help just ask me
[code]Line [3915] Client [/code]
[code]int ai[] = new int[sprite.myWidth];[/code]
[code]Line [9140] Client [/code]
[code]drawLogo();[/code]
[code]Line [38] RSApplet[/code]
[code]startUp();[/code]
[code]Line [6078] Client [/code]
[code]super.run();[/code]
plz help me i want to get back to My Project

item.title: Big Client Bug
item.dc:creator: @TheIronDoorProject TheIronDoorProject
item.description:
@TheIronDoorProject wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:6, topic:524661”]looks like it can’t find the logo inside title.dat

check the cache with toms cache suite. or if you dont want the logo, just remove it.[/quote]Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Big Client Bug
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

looks like it can’t find the logo inside title.dat

check the cache with toms cache suite. or if you dont want the logo, just remove it.

Read full topic

item.title: Big Client Bug
item.dc:creator: @TheIronDoorProject TheIronDoorProject
item.description:
@TheIronDoorProject wrote:

[code][quote=“Vain_, post:4, topic:524661”]what is ‘sprite’

post further code from client.drawLogo()[/quote]

= titleStreamLoader.getDataForName("title.dat"); Sprite sprite = new Sprite(abyte0, this); if(normalLogin == false) { leftSideFlame.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(0, 0); rightSideFlame.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-637, 0); aRSImageProducer_1107.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-128, 0); aRSImageProducer_1108.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-202, -371); loadingScreenArea.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(0, 0); loginScreenArea.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-202, -171); gameLogo.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(0, -265); aRSImageProducer_1113.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-562, -265); aRSImageProducer_1114.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-128, -171); aRSImageProducer_1115.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-562, -171); int ai[] = new int[sprite.myWidth]; for(int j = 0; j < sprite.myHeight; j++) { for(int k = 0; k < sprite.myWidth; k++) ai[k] = sprite.myPixels[(sprite.myWidth * k) + sprite.myWidth * j]; System.arraycopy(ai, 0, sprite.myPixels, sprite.myWidth * j, sprite.myWidth); } if(normalLogin == true) { /*leftSideFlame.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(382, 0); rightSideFlame.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-255, 0); aRSImageProducer_1107.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(254, 0); aRSImageProducer_1108.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(180, -371); loginScreenArea.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(180, -171); gameLogo.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(382, -265); aRSImageProducer_1113.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-180, -265); aRSImageProducer_1114.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(254, -171); aRSImageProducer_1115.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(-180, -171);*/ sprite = new Sprite(titleStreamLoader, "logo", 0); aRSImageProducer_1107.initDrawingArea(); //sprite.drawSprite(382 - sprite.myWidth / 2 - 128, 18); } } else { int ai[] = new int[sprite.myWidth]; for(int j = 0; j < sprite.myHeight; j++) { for(int k = 0; k < sprite.myWidth; k++) ai[k] = sprite.myPixels[(sprite.myWidth - k - 1) + sprite.myWidth * j]; System.arraycopy(ai, 0, sprite.myPixels, sprite.myWidth * j, sprite.myWidth); } LFull = new Sprite("Login/Random/LFull.png"); LEmpty = new Sprite("Login/Random/LEmpty.png"); Sprite logo = new Sprite(sign.signlink.findcachedir()+"/Sprites/Logo.PNG"); logo.drawSprite(385-174-174, 14+25); loginScreenArea.initDrawingArea(); sprite.method346(0, 0); } sprite = null; Object obj = null; Object obj1 = null; System.gc(); }
